prompts: /question --- Is it posisble to run the orchestrator agent from the Claude Code CLI rather than the frontend?

I would like to use this framework in a completely seperate project, leveraging the agentic techniques introudced in this cutting-edge repo. That said, I don't want to have to deal with having to take this codebase and import it into my other project. Can you help me understand how I can take the patterns used here for orchestrator driven agentic development with cascading, custom, hyper-focused subagents and use it in my other repo? For context here's what I already have in my other repo: .claude

Awesome. Now, can you help me setup a system that allows the orchestrator agent to create specialized, "one-off" sub agents that are hyperfocused on addressing a single issue/request? I believe that this exists in this repo already, double check then report bac
